data.message: I dont know if you actually read these or not, but I want to let you know how much of an inspiration you are to me. I went down a bad road due to pills, I checked myself into rehab with the VA. They showed a youtube video of you talking about your struggles with pills. You talked a little about rehab and how you got clean. I read that you overdosed and everything on pills. So hearing and seeing the success youve had since getting sober is a huge inspiration to me. God bless you.
